name: The Worm
overview: An adventure game developed by Henrik Hagberg and published in 64'er 1995/11. Once upon a time there was a worm called: Worlie. Worlie was like any other worm, winding around looking for something juicy to eat. Suddenly, through a hole he discovers paradise! A garden, full of delicious roses! But little did Worlie know these roses belonged to the king. The king was furious at the destruction of his roses and sentenced the worm to life imprisonment in the tower. When he saw the large wooden door to the tower he vowed never to let a door stand in his way. And thus begins this adventure.
